Action from the 2012/13 Championship play-off final at Wembley Stadium, as the teams contested a place in the top flight alongside the already promoted Cardiff City and Hull City. Palace reached this match when Wilfried Zaha scored a brace in a 2-0 away win against Brighton & Hove Albion after a goalless draw in the first leg.
